changeSet.author: htaycher
changeSet.sql: Update study_parameter_value set value = 'yes' where parameter in('interviewerNameRequired', 'interviewDateRequired') and value = 'true'

changeSet.author: htaycher
changeSet.sql: Update study_parameter_value set value = 'no' where parameter in('interviewerNameRequired', 'interviewDateRequired') and value = 'false'
